text.div:
ActionRelationshipAnchor

Defines possible anchors for the relationship between actions

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/action-relationship-anchor defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
start StartThe action relationship is anchored to the start of the related action
end EndThe action relationship is anchored to the end of the related action

name: ActionRelationshipAnchor
description: Defines possible anchors for the relationship between actions

concept.definition: The action relationship is anchored to the start of the related action
The action relationship is anchored to the end of the related action
